column2:
"Okay, all set! My Photon Arts are all set in place. How about...
Never mind, I'm sure you've got yours all set up."
"This has been great practice. I mean, you've got to know how to switch your Photon Arts based on your opponent and where you are."
"I kinda joined ARKS in a hurry, so I might have missed out on stuff like this."
"Thanks for practicing with me. It was a huge help!"
